      • getEquipment

        public static java.util.List<ModelEquipment> getEquipment()
        Generates a list of ModelEquipment objects that contains the equipment name and status of the equipment on every koie.
        Returns:
        List of ModelEquipment objects.

      • getEquipmentStatus

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getEquipmentStatus(java.lang.String koieName)
        Checks the equipment status on every equipment on a given koie. Used to check whether all list values are 0. (Means that all equipment on the given koie is okay).
        Parameters:
        koieName - Name of the koie you want equipment status on
        Returns:
        List of integers

      • updateEquipment

        public static void updateEquipment(java.lang.String equipment,
                                   int newStatus,
                                   java.lang.String koieName)
        Updates the equipment status on the given koie.
        Parameters:
        equipment - The equipment you want to change status on
        newStatus - The new status you want for that equipment
        koieName - The koie you want to change the equipment status on
